rukus.text: Allahe'i srstira sucana karae, tara pichata teraemi iyara punaraabrtti karaiba, tara pichata tomalokaka te'omra ocarate'i pratyarartana karaoraa ha’ba
Arau yidina kiyamata sanghatita ha’ba se'idina aparaadhibilaka hatasa hai paraiba
Arau (allahara lagata karaa) sihamtara sbaraikasakala sihamtara babe chuparaichakarai nahaba arau sihamte sihamtara sbaraikakrta upasyaborara asbikarakarai ha’ba
Arau yidina kiyamata sanghatita ha’ba se'idina sihamta bibhakta hai paraiba
Eteke yisakale imana aniche arau satkarma karaiche te'omloke jannatata sukha-santita thakiba
arau yisakale kupharai karaiche lagate amara ayatasamuha arau akhiraatara saksataka asbikara karaiche, parainamata sihamtaka sastira majata upasthita karaa ha’ba
Eteke tomaloke allahara paraitrata arau mahima ghosana karaa, yetiya tomaloke sandhata upanita horaa arau poraa sajaga horaa
abeli arau yetiya tomaloke dupuraiyata upanita horaa. Te'omra babe'i sakalo prasansa akasasamuhata arau prthiraita
Teraemi nirjirara paraa sajira uliya'i ane arau teraemi jiraitara paraa mrtaka uliya'i ane. Arau teraemi bhumika tara mrtyura pichata akau punarjiraita karae. E'idarae'i tomalokako uliya'i ana ha’ba
